tossup_question: -   –  What is the term for the lowest temperature that can be attained by evaporating water into the air?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)Minimum temperature
X)Wind chill temperature
Y)Wet bulb temperature
Z)Dry bulb temperature
bonus_question: -   –  In South Africa sedimentary rocks of Archean age have been found with rounded pyrite pebbles, which are not found in sedimentary rocks today. What is the most likely reason for this?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W)Pyrite is no longer formed on Earth's surface
X)Liquid water was not present during the Archean
Y)Atmospheric oxygen levels were very low in the Archean
Z)Atmospheric pressure was lower in the Archean
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Y) ATMOSPHERIC OXYGEN LEVELS WERE VERY LOW IN THE ARCHEAN
